name: R5_v2_0279_for_R4
title: Cross-version VS for R5.Hl7VSAllowSubstitutionCodes for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0279|2.0.0 for use in FHIR R4. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R5 to R4.

concept.display: Contact the Placer Contact Person prior to making any substitutions of this resource
